description: Parses full email thread context, generates professional reply/follow-up drafts in a sales-director tone, and supports multi-turn conversational refinement. Handles sending finalized drafts via Gmail.

result.draft_subject: The subject line of the draft
result.draft_body: The full body content of the drafted email
result.thread_summary: Brief summary of the email thread context
result.tone: The detected/applied tone of the draft
result.status: Status of the operation (draft_ready, sent, saved, error)
result.message: Any additional message or confirmation to the user
